ygData.subject: Re: Exploring the windmills
ygData.msgSnippet: You know I thought of that once, but a long time ago when I was a newbie, I remember trying to hail her and accidentally hitting the attack key and ended up
ygData.messageBody:
You know I thought of that once, but a long time ago when I was a newbie, I
remember trying to hail her and accidentally hitting the attack key and
ended up killing her. :) She didn't drop anything.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

> From: Nilen23@...
>
> I don't now what he drops but there is another lower level gnome npc that
> stands near the path in front of the windmills. You get a faction hit for
> killing her against gnomes and she cons blue to me at 9. Anyone kill her
> recently? And if so what loot does that one have.
